title: Disappearance
story: In the small town of Oakwood, there was a mysterious disappearance that left the townspeople baffled.
Isabel Miller, a local waitress, vanished without a trace one stormy night after leaving her shift at the diner.
The townsfolk were buzzing with theories, and the local authorities were struggling to find any leads.
prompt: A small town with dark clouds looming in the sky, deserted streets, and worried townspeople.

suspect.name: Jack Stone
suspect.alibi: Claims he was at home all evening watching TV.
suspect.confirmation: No one can confirm his whereabouts.

witness.name: Evelyn Carter
witness.observation: Saw Isabel talking to a stranger in a dark coat outside the diner.
witness.description: Eager to help but deeply concerned for Isabel's safety.

npcs.name: Sheriff Thompson
npcs.dialogue: We're doing everything we can to locate Isabel and bring her home safely.

npcs.name: Rachel Greene
npcs.dialogue: I overheard Isabel talking about leaving town for good, but I'm not sure if it means anything.

clues.front door: Isabel's keys left on the counter.
clues.diner: A mysterious note slipped under Isabel's place at the diner.
clues.abandoned warehouse: A torn piece of Isabel's scarf found on the ground.
clues.local bar: Tales of strangers in dark coats frequenting the area in recent weeks.
